name: Gray Ooze
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, fatigue, frightened, prone
senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 8

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) acid damage. Nonmagical metal armor worn by the target corrodes  taking a permanent -1 penalty to its AC protection per hit. If the penalty reduces the armors AC protection to 10  the armor is destroyed.

special_abilities.name: Amorphous
special_abilities.desc: The ooze can pass through an opening as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Corrosive Body
special_abilities.desc: A creature or a metal object that touches the ooze takes 5 (2d4) acid damage. A nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the black pudding corrodes after dealing damage, taking a permanent -1 penalty to damage rolls per hit. If this penalty reaches -5, the weapon is destroyed. Metal nonmagical ammunition is destroyed after dealing damage.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless, the ooze is indistinguishable from wet stone.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the ooze has disadvantage on attack rolls.

special_abilities.name: Ooze Nature
special_abilities.desc: An ooze doesnt require air or sleep.
